timeline.bodyText: Can we use a test prefix for this method. Something like testIsMining.
timeline.author: jiripetrlik

timeline.bodyText: Maybe we should test more options. Maybe I'm doing something wrong, but I've changed the logic of isMining method backwards and the test passed anyway.
